name: Friday at Barney's (Ludum Dare 46)
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 46. You can see its LD page here.

You have accidentally killed your boss, and you don't want to go to jail. Will you be able to hide his death?

INSTRUCTIONS
This is a point and click adventure. Just click on objects from the scene to interact with them or add them to your inventory. Click on an object from your inventory to use it. Also, you can click on doorways to go to another room.

CREDITS
Game by FdezGuillen/AnaGF and Manuel Guillen
